name: SpaceBros (josemitsu)
description:
GMTKJam entry

Two space bros tryng to retrieve a especial capsule from a stream of cosmic rays

play alone or with a partner 

* * * 

A,W,S,D  to move the left spaceship 

& Key Arrows to move the spaceship at the right

* * *

Objective: move the capsule that is joined to both ships trough the stream of light but be careful the capsule may break if you touch the borders of space and look out for space debries that will come your way

-----------------------------------------------------------------

tools and assets

Game made with Godot

Music with BeepBox online

Pixel-art: GraphicGale

Font: manaspace from codeman38 | cody@zone38.net | http://www.zone38.net/
